destiny.story.reason/1: You have been chosen. This year, you are part of Project Genesis.
destiny.story.travelling/1: You have been transported to an isolated Bunker, far from what remains of humanity, with the hope of bringing it back to life.
destiny.story.somewhere/1: The point of no return has come. Will you be remembered as the one who gave humanity a second chance, or will you fade into oblivion as another failed attempt?
